title: Rice
creator_credit: Wheaton Galentine, Willard Van Dyke and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Discusses the importance of rice in the life and culture of the people of Asia, pointing out that primitive methods cannot produce enough food for Asia’s rapidly increasing population. Describes the work of two American foundations which have established a research and training centre to assist Asian farmers increase their yield. Written by Howard Enders Narrated by John Connell.
